tagline: A jQuery plugin that allows you to add social buttons in a privacy friendly way
body:
### Welcome to Two Clicks For Privacy.

This is a translation of the socialshareprivacy plugin from heise :
http://www.heise.de/extras/socialshareprivacy/

The writeup in german is here, but we cannot translate it due to copyright :
http://www.heise.de/ct/artikel/2-Klicks-fuer-mehr-Datenschutz-1333879.html
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Socialshareprivacy
